## Slots

| Slot           | Description                                                               |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"body"`       | The primary slot to render editorial or WYSIWYG content.                  |
| `"multimedia"` | The slot to render an optional image, video or donut on top of the block. |
